channel.title: different browser webrtc leak
channel.description: First of all, I apologize for my bad english. real ip unnoticed i need to use webrtc so i installed whonix but tor browser webrtc is blocking different to whonix install a browser Will using webrtc cause my real ip to be noticed? I'm thinking of using brave or firefox on whonix ws for webrtc to work.

item.title: different browser webrtc leak
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
anoka:

Will using webrtc cause my real ip to be noticed?

No.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Security_by_Isolation

anoka:

I’m thinking of using brave or firefox on whonix ws for webrtc to work.

Related, recommended reading why that might be a bad idea:

Whonix – 19 Jul 22

Tor Browser Essentials

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

Read full topic
